title: Saptashrungi Devi Temple
subtitle: The Hill of Seven Peaks — Abode of Goddess Saptashrungi Nivasini
overview: Saptashrungi Devi Temple, near Nashik, is one of the most revered Shakti Peethas of Maharashtra. The temple is perched atop a hill surrounded by seven mountain peaks, symbolizing the seven arms of the goddess.
Pilgrims climb over 500 steps or take a ropeway to reach the temple, which offers panoramic views and divine peace.

highlights.title: Saptashrungi Devi Idol
highlights.description: The 10-foot tall idol carved into a rock face, adorned with sindoor and ornaments.

highlights.title: Scenic Ropeway Ride
highlights.description: Modern ropeway facility provides easy access and stunning views.

geography.intro: Located 60 km from Nashik city, near the village of Vani, amidst the Western Ghats.

climate.description: The hill temple enjoys cool weather during winter and becomes lush green in monsoon.

geography.conclusion: October to February is the best time to visit for clear skies and pleasant weather.

activities.title: Darshan and Aarti
activities.description: Participate in daily prayers and aarti ceremonies filled with devotion.
info: Morning and evening aartis are mesmerizing.
Devotees often climb barefoot as a sign of respect.

activities.title: Ropeway & Trek
activities.description: Enjoy a thrilling ropeway ride or take the traditional 510-step path.
info: Ropeway tickets available at the base station.

activities.title: Explore the Surrounding Peaks
activities.description: Hike around the seven peaks and enjoy panoramic views.
info: Ideal for nature lovers and photographers.

attractions.title: Main Temple
attractions.description: The rock-carved idol of Goddess Saptashrungi.

attractions.title: Hill Viewpoint
attractions.description: Offers breathtaking vistas of the surrounding valleys.

marineLife.intro: While not coastal, the region’s natural springs and forests support rich biodiversity.

items.title: Mountain Flora
items.description: Forests around Saptashrungi are home to various medicinal plants.

items.title: Peaceful Habitat
items.description: Birdsong and wind create a tranquil spiritual setting.

conclusion: The temple is a harmony of faith and nature.
Perfect for spiritual rejuvenation and scenic exploration.

howToReach.title: By Road
details: Buses and taxis are available from Nashik and Vani.

howToReach.title: By Rail
details: Nashik Road railway station connects major cities like Mumbai and Pune.
From there, local transport takes 2 hours to reach.

bookingTips.description: Buy ropeway tickets in advance on weekends.
Morning visits offer cooler weather and fewer crowds.
Climbing barefoot is customary for devotees.
